Class issues_logic

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.tabbedversion.issues_logic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, IssuesHelper

    public class issues_logic
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements IssuesHelper
    This issues page will display an issue to the user and the user will have to decide and submit an option as to solve the problem

        This method should check which check box is selected and send the users selected option to the server using a POST request
        Specified by:
        sendOptionToServer in interface IssuesHelper
        Parameters:
        A - Checkbox for the selected option A
        B - Checkbox for the selected option B
        C - CheckBox for the selected option none
        issueid - issue being resolved
        Ans - TextView box that displays what happens once the option is selected
        issue - TextView box that displays any errors
